    • About Mike Roth


    Over the last twelve months, we have closed over 210 transactions – compare this to the average real estate agent that sold less than four homes in the same period of time. More importantly, we are bringing our sellers an average of 96% or more of the asking price. This is all done on a timetable of 35 days that the home being on the market. I’ve been in the real estate business for over 37 years and have closed over 6,000 deals. There hasn’t been a problem we’ve come across that we can’t solve in today’s market – especially in the challenging market we have today. We will also determine the best price that you can receive in this market. One of the biggest problems in this industry is the lack of communication between the seller and their agent. We have a dedicated team that will be available to you seven days a week. You can rest assured knowing that all of your questions will be answered and you will be updated through every step of the transaction. You also can expect Weekly Activity Reports that include how many hits your listing has gained from the internet, TV advertising, and feedback we’ve received from the buyers. When you’re ready to sell your home, give the Roth Team a call or send us an email.’

    Mike Roth
    The Roth Team
    Shorewest Realtors
